truths: Push block B1, B2, B3, B4 and B5 into pink special area SA2 so that all blocks are in SA2
Place the blocks B1, and B2 into special area SA2
Put all the blocks inside special area SA2.
cot:
The ground truth goals all describe a scenario where multiple blocks (B1, B2, B3, B4, and B5) or at least two blocks (B1 and B2) are to be moved into a specific area labeled SA2. The predicted goal states to "Gather all blocks into SA2," which aligns with the intent of moving blocks into SA2 as described in the ground truths.

The predicted goal does not specify the number of blocks, but it uses the term "all blocks," which would include B1, B2, B3, B4, and B5. Therefore, the predicted goal matches the ground truth goals that mention moving all blocks into SA2 and putting all the blocks inside special area SA2.

The predicted goal is (2) Correct: An agent that tries to achieve the predicted goal will succeed in achieving the real goal, as it would lead to the same outcome of having all blocks in SA2.
